snippet: Rabbi Nuchem Rosenberg, an advocate for child sexual abuse victims in the Satmar Hasidic community, was injured Tuesday when a chemical believed to be bleach was thrown in his face.
abstract: Rabbi Nuchem Rosenberg, an outspoken advocate for child sexual abuse victims in the Satmar Hasidic community, is injured when a chemical believed to be bleach is thrown in his face on a street in Williamsburg, Brooklyn; he believes the attack is related to the conviction of Nechemya Weberman, prominent community member found guilty of repeatedly sexually abusing a girl who came to him for counseling.
lead_paragraph: Rabbi Nuchem Rosenberg, an advocate for child sexual abuse victims in the Satmar Hasidic community, was injured Tuesday when a chemical believed to be bleach was thrown in his face.

headline.seo: Rabbi Nuchem Rosenberg Doused, Maybe With Bleach, in Williamsburg
headline.main: Chemical Thrown at Rabbi Who Aided Victims of Abuse
headline.print_headline: Chemical Thrown at Rabbi Who Aided Victims of Abuse
